title: pannaga shayama
sahitya:
pannaga shayana padmanAbha paripAlaya mAm pankajanAbha


anupallavi

 unnata pANDya kEraLa nivAsa shrInivAsa cidAnanda vilAsa


caraNam   pAyasAnna priyakara shrIkara parashurAma kSEtra prabhAkara 
parama bhakta prahlAdAdi vinuta prasiddha guruguha hitOpakAra 
mAyAtIta mandara giridhara karadhrta shankha cakra gadAdi dhara 
tOyajAdi samsEvita dAmOdara dayAkara varada kara
